sources.title: Let's Face It
sources.description: A cold war gem from the Civil Defence Department

sources.title: Let's Face It (1943)
sources.description: Bob Hope, Betty Hutton, ZaSu Pitts, Dave Willock, Eve Arden

metadata.Plot: A soldier stationed on an army base and his fianc√©, who runs a women's "fat farm" nearby, want to get married but don't have enough money. Three customers of the "fat farm" scheme to get back at their philandering husbands by hiring the soldier and two of his buddies as "escorts" for the weekend. Complications ensue when the husbands show up unexpectedly.
metadata.Writer: Dorothy Fields, Herbert Fields, Russell G. Medcraft
metadata.Actors: Bob Hope, Betty Hutton, Zasu Pitts
